plot: A popular radio personality in the 1940's brought his variety talent contest show to television that continued into the 1950's.
plot_en: A popular radio personality in the 1940's brought his variety talent contest show to television that continued into the 1950's.
plot_es: A popular radio personality in the 1940's brought his variety talent contest show to television that continued into the 1950's.
title: Talent Scouts
